semantics.label: Task description
semantics.description: Describe how the user should solve the task.
semantics.default: Drag the words into the correct boxes

semantics.label: Text
semantics.placeholder: *Oslo* is the capital of Norway, *Stockholm* is the capital of Sweden and *Copenhagen* is the capital of Denmark. All cities are located in the *Scandinavian:Northern Part of Europe* peninsula.

important.description:
• Droppable words are added with an asterisk (*) in front and behind the correct word/phrase.
  • You may add a textual tip, using a colon (:) in front of the tip.
  • For every empty spot there is only one correct word.
  • You may add feedback to be displayed when a task is completed. Use '\+' for correct and '\-' for incorrect feedback.
important.example: H5P content may be edited using a *browser:What type of program is Chrome?*. </br> H5P content is *interactive\+Correct! \-Incorrect, try again!*

fields.label: Define custom feedback for any score range
fields.description: Click the "Add range" button to add as many ranges as you need. Example: 0-20% Bad score, 21-91% Average Score, 91-100% Great Score!

semantics.label: Text for "Check" button
semantics.default: ពិនិត្យចម្លើយ

semantics.label: Text for "Retry" button
semantics.default: សាកម្តងទៀត

semantics.label: Text for "Show Solution" button
semantics.default: បង្ហាញចម្លើយត្រឹមត្រូវ

semantics.label: Numbered Drop zone label
semantics.default: តំបន់ទម្លាក់ @index
semantics.description: Label used for accessibility, where the Read speaker will read the index of a drop zone. Variable available: @index

semantics.label: Empty Drop Zone label
semantics.default: តំបន់ទម្លាក់ @index គឺទទេ។
semantics.description: Label used for accessibility, where the Read speaker will read that the drop zone is empty

semantics.label: Contains Drop Zone label
semantics.default: តំបន់ទម្លាក់ @index មានធាតុអូស @draggable។
semantics.description: Label used for accessibility, where the Read speaker will read that the drop zone contains a draggable

semantics.label: Draggable elements label
semantics.default: @index ចំណោមធាតុអូស @count ។
semantics.description: Label used for accessibility, where the Read speaker reads that this is a draggable element. Variable available: @index, @count

semantics.label: Label for show tip button
semantics.default: បង្ហាញគន្លឹះ
semantics.description: Label used for accessibility, where the Read speaker reads it before the tip is read out

semantics.label: Readspeaker text for correct answer
semantics.default: ត្រឹមត្រូវ!

semantics.label: Readspeaker text for incorrect answer
semantics.default: មិនត្រឹមត្រូវ!

semantics.label: Confirmation dialog title that user wants to reset a droppable
semantics.default: កំណត់ការទម្លាក់ឡើងវិញ

semantics.label: Confirmation dialog description that user wants to reset a droppable
semantics.default: តើអ្នកពិតជាចង់ធ្វើការកំណត់ឡើងវិញសម្រាប់តំបន់ទម្លាក់នេះមែនទេ?

semantics.label: Label used for accessibility, where the read speaker indicates that dragging is initiated
semantics.default: ធាតុអូសត្រូវបានចាប់។

semantics.label: Label used for accessibility, where the read speaker indicates that dragging is canceled
semantics.default: បោះបង់ការចាប់

semantics.label: Label used for accessibility, where the read speaker indicates that a text is the correct answer
semantics.default: ចម្លើយត្រឹមត្រូវ:

semantics.label: Header for panel containing feedback for correct/incorrect answers
semantics.default: មូលវិចារណ៍

semantics.label: Behavioural settings.
semantics.description: These options will let you control how the task behaves.

semantics.label: Textual representation of the score bar for those using a readspeaker
semantics.default: អ្នកបានពិន្ទុ :num លើ :total

semantics.label: Assistive technology label for "Check" button
semantics.default: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.

semantics.label: Assistive technology label for "Show Solution" button
semantics.default: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.

semantics.label: Assistive technology label for "Retry" button
semantics.default: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.
